original_text: I would be resting with kings and rulers. They lived in beautiful houses which are now heaps of stones. I would be resting with kings and rulers.
korean_text: 자기를 위하여 폐허를 일으킨 세상 임금들과 모사들과 함께 있었을 것이요

sentences.original_text: I would be resting with kings and rulers
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 왕들과 통치자들과 함께 쉬고 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: which are now heaps of stones
I would be resting with kings and rulers
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 왕들과 통치자들과 함께 쉬고 있을 것이다
